message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8800. I really like the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still a bit above your target. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $9200.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target. I'm willing to go up to $9000, but no more. Can you consider that?
